enigma.event
Class TextWindowEvent

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.util.EventObject
        |
        +--enigma.event.TextWindowEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class TextWindowEvent
extends EventObject

TextWindowEvents are fired when TextWindows are resized.

Author:
Ethan Royael Nicholas (ethan@ethannicholas.com)
See Also:
Serialized Form
Status:
STABLE. No incompatible changes will be made in the future.
